thread.title: If you love romantic movies, then you’re going to want everything from Too Faced’s spring collection
thread.title_full: If you love romantic movies, then you’re going to want everything from Too Faced’s spring collection

author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
title: If you love romantic movies, then you’re going to want everything from Too Faced’s spring collection
text:
If you love romantic movies, then you’re going to want everything from Too Faced’s spring collection We really can’t think of a beauty brand better suited to creating a perfect spring line than our darling friends over at Too Faced Cosmetics — their romantic, dreamy aesthetic is the perfect match for the impending season! We’re so pumped to find out exactly what they’ll be releasing for their upcoming spring collection and we have a feeling you will be too !
Technically, it’s just three products that are being released, but they’re so versatile that it feels like much more! We’ve seen them in sneak peeks here or there on social media thanks to Jerrod Blandino, but knowing for sure that they’re headed our way this spring feels extra exciting!
Here is the complete #Spring - #Summer2017 #Collection ☀️ @toofaced Includes: 1. #LoveLight ✨in 3 different shades: Light Highlighter with a silver packaging, Pink Highlighter with a metallic pink packaging, Gold Highlighter with a gold packaging 2. This gorgeous #NaturalLove Palette 3. And 6 NEW #MeltedMatte Shades Will be available ➡ on their website MARCH 9TH I can't wait!!! Who else is feeling it? ✨#Trendmood #toofaced #makeupartist #instamakeup #makeup #makeup #mua #glow #makeuplover #makeupaddict #highlight #highlighter #BlindedByTheLight pic: #TF THANK U for this GORGEOUS update! @xoxomonie_ @mcdonoughhhs @debbiemichellel 
A photo posted by TRENDMOOD (@trendmood1) on Feb 7, 2017 at 9:46am PST 
We love seeing them all together like that, don’t you? What did we do before Trendmood? Thank goodness for the internet and the ability to allow ourselves to get completely obsessed with upcoming products before they’re released!
Here’s what’s headed our way come spring:
Love Light highlighters in three different shades. ✨TURN ON YOUR LOVE LIGHT ✨ March 2017 #toofaced #comingsoon 
A photo posted by Jerrod Blandino (@jerrodblandino) on Jan 10, 2017 at 12:50pm PST 
The Blinded by the Light highlighter comes in silver packaging, Ray of Light is a light pink highlighter that comes in metallic pink packaging, and You Light Up My Life is a gold highlighter that comes in a gold packaging.
UPDATE The Names ✨ @TooFaced The NEW! #LoveLight in 3 different shades: #BlindedByTheLight - a light highlighter with a silver packaging #RayOfLight - light pink highlighter with a metallic pink packaging #YouLightUpMyLife - gold highlighter with a gold packaging ✨#ComingSoon ➡ MARCH 9TH 2017 on their website first I can't wait!!! What about u? ✨#Trendmood #toofaced #makeupartist #instamakeup #makeup #makeup #mua #glow #makeuplover #makeupaddict #highlight #highlighter #BlindedByTheLight #DiamondHeart pic: @giuliamachiaje THANK U for this AMAZING update: @lexi.wall 
A photo posted by TRENDMOOD (@trendmood1) on Feb 7, 2017 at 10:44am PST 
The Natural Love Palette. Who likes their Love Natural? #comingsoon #toofaced #Summer17 
A photo posted by Jerrod Blandino (@jerrodblandino) on Dec 30, 2016 at 9:57am PST 
We are over-the-moon excited to try out this new palette — it truly captures the essence of all things spring romance! This is gonna be one of the best eyeshadow palettes of the year!
6 new Melted Matte Lipstick Shades. #SneakyPeek New Melted Matte shades coming your way! #March2017 #summer #toofaced 
A photo posted by Jerrod Blandino (@jerrodblandino) on Jan 18, 2017 at 10:21am PST 
We have fully passed on from the anticipation of getting our hands on these gorgeous new lipsticks. Not only are the pinky purple shades absolutely to die for and ideal for spring, but the addition of that vibrant teal green pushes it over the top into iconic territory. Only a genius like Blandino could pull something like this off, do you think it’s fair to send him our blood pressure medication bill? Because we can’t handle this much beauty! You’ll be able to get these gorgeous products starting on March 9th, which all things considered isn’t too far off! Just daydreaming about one day having a chance to use these will get us through our current national nightmare. If you need a lil something in the meantime to keep you busy til then, head on over to Too Faced Cosmetics and take a gander!
